# Welcome {.unnumbered}

This is the website for the [Quarto book](https://quarto.org/docs/books) **"EDA for ML"** (`eda4ml`), which presents exploratory data analysis (EDA) and related topics in order to prepare you to learn more about machine learning (ML).

This website is free, licensed under the [MIT](https://opensource.org/license/mit) License.  You are invited to copy and change the content to create your own version of this course.
